mapper.select: SELECT b.COMPANY,b.FIELD,i.STOREDFILENAME,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW r,BIZ b WHERE b.BSMNO=r.BSMNO) a FROM BIZ b,IMAGE i WHERE b.ATTACHID=i.ATTACHID AND rownum<=4 ORDER by a desc
SELECT TO_CHAR(R.REG_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as REG_DATE, R.REVIEW, B.COMPANY FROM REVIEW R,BIZ B WHERE ROWNUM<=8 AND R.BSMNO=B.BSMNO ORDER BY R.REG_DATE DESC
